title: Did Ohio's 12th province contain 170 "picturers " who had been crooked for 116 years?
subtitle: The right-wing websites have published misleading allegations of voter fraud in Ohio, based on evidence that is very clearly flawed.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The 12th District of Ohio in Congress recorded 170 fraudulent votes made in August 2018 by people with dates of birth before 1902.
